      • logThrowable

        public static void logThrowable(java.lang.String message,
                java.lang.Throwable t)
        Sends a message and a throwable to the server where they will be logged as an error. Only use this with your own Java exceptions in GWT code. Native exceptions are useless for a GWT developer and logUncaughtNativeClientException() should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        properJavaThrowable -

      • logUncaughtNativeClientException

        public static void logUncaughtNativeClientException()
        Sends a notification to the server that a native and unpredicted exception occured in the client code.
